name: Fallen Region
description:
Fallen Region is a third-person survival sandbox game in an open, post-apocalyptic world and extensive gaming capabilities. The game immerses you in a realistic gaming environment saturated with the atmosphere of the post-apocalypse. In the world there are various NPCs such as zombies, military, animals. Different types of weapons are available for battle. The game also has craft and building. Level up your character to get more opportunities!

The region is infected with the virus, you are one of the survivors, further survival depends on you. Try to survive!

GAME FEATURES


  • Level System
  • Day and Night Cycle
  • Crafting
  • Building
  • Various NPC
  • World Exploration
  • Equipment and Clothing System
  • Open World
  • Driving
  • Looting
  • Mining
